scripts.build: rm -rf public/lib && mkdir -p public/lib && mkdir -p public/lib/canvas && cp node_modules/fairy-stockfish-nnue.wasm/* public/lib && cp node_modules/ffish-es6/ffish.wasm public/ && uglifyjs src/js/main.js -c -m > src/js/main.min.js && browserify -p esmify src/js/main.min.js -o public/bundle.js && rm -f src/js/main.min.js && cp node_modules/mithril/mithril.min.js public/lib && cp src/js/*Feature.js public/lib && cp src/js/*.canvas.worker.js public/lib/canvas && cp -f src/js/server.js . && node src/make_index_page.js > src/html/index.html && uglifyjs public/bundle.js -c --in-situ && uglifyjs public/lib/*Feature.js -c -m --in-situ && uglifyjs public/lib/canvas/*.canvas.worker.js -c -m --in-situ && html-minifier --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --remove-optional-tags --remove-redundant-attributes --remove-script-type-attributes --remove-tag-whitespace --use-short-doctype --minify-css true --minify-js true --input-dir src/html --output-dir public --file-ext html && rm -f src/html/index.html && echo && echo Build finished with compression and mangling to reduce file size. && echo "To build without compression and mangling, run \"npm run debug-build\"".
scripts.buildwithcmd: rd /s /q public\lib & md public\lib && md public\lib\canvas && copy /Y node_modules\fairy-stockfish-nnue.wasm\* public\lib && copy /Y node_modules\ffish-es6\ffish.wasm public\ && uglifyjs src/js/main.js -c -m > src\js\main.min.js && browserify -p esmify src/js/main.min.js -o public/bundle.js && del /f /q src\js\main.min.js && copy /Y node_modules\mithril\mithril.min.js public\lib && copy /Y src\js\*Feature.js public\lib\ && copy /Y src\js\*.canvas.worker.js public\lib\canvas\ && copy /Y src\js\server.js .\  && node src\make_index_page.js > src\html\index.html && uglifyjs public\bundle.js -c --in-situ && uglifyjs public\lib\*Feature.js -c -m --in-situ && uglifyjs public\lib\canvas\*.canvas.worker.js -c -m --in-situ && html-minifier --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --remove-optional-tags --remove-redundant-attributes --remove-script-type-attributes --remove-tag-whitespace --use-short-doctype --minify-css true --minify-js true --input-dir src\html --output-dir public --file-ext html && del /f /q src\html\index.html && echo. && echo Build finished with compression and mangling to reduce file size. && echo To build without compression and mangling, run "npm run debug-buildwithcmd".
scripts.debug-build: rm -rf public/lib && mkdir -p public/lib && mkdir -p public/lib/canvas && cp node_modules/fairy-stockfish-nnue.wasm/* public/lib && cp node_modules/ffish-es6/ffish.wasm public/ && browserify -p esmify src/js/main.js -o public/bundle.js && cp node_modules/mithril/mithril.min.js public/lib && cp src/js/*Feature.js public/lib && cp src/js/*.canvas.worker.js public/lib/canvas && cp -f src/js/server.js . && cp -f src/html/* public && node src/make_index_page.js > public/index.html && echo && echo Debug build finished.
scripts.debug-buildwithcmd: rd /s /q public\lib & md public\lib && md public\lib\canvas && copy /Y node_modules\fairy-stockfish-nnue.wasm\* public\lib && copy /Y node_modules\ffish-es6\ffish.wasm public\ && browserify -p esmify src/js/main.js -o public/bundle.js && copy /Y node_modules\mithril\mithril.min.js public\lib && copy /Y src\js\*Feature.js public\lib\ && copy /Y src\js\*.canvas.worker.js public\lib\canvas\ && copy /Y src\js\server.js .\ && copy /Y src\html\* public\ && node src\make_index_page.js > public\index.html && echo. && echo Debug build finished.
